name: Slider Puzzle 5 by 4
description:
Slider Puzzle is traditional good old slider puzzle with full screen pictures and photos, divided into 5 by 4 squares. Move the pieces to rearrange the picture. Use coins to buy help, show the order of the pieces or swap two pieces. Make more coins when you solve the puzzle with less moves.
This game is a sequel to our first puzzle ( easier to play ) slider puzzle .

Slide the Picture Puzzle-The Puzzle of Moving Pieces

Enjoy!
